amendment.description: Amendment prohibits use of funds to enter into contracts with entities who are convicted of fraud.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to prohibit use of funds to enter into contracts with entities who are convicted of fraud.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Grayson amendment (A055) Agreed to by voice vote.
